text: @BryanCranston @OneRebelRebel Agree. Very sad. But someone with balls needs to step up and shout it from the Halls of Congress. The times call for a leader. A National Leader. With a National Plan looking to defeat COVID-19 AND lead us into the future. The earth and economy will not heal themselves. Peace
